name: Kill the Immortal
description:
Destroy swarms of zombies and kill the evil Immortal!

This is a simple but challenging FPS with an emphasis on shooting enemies. Shoot as many bullets as you like, destroy swarms of zombies, and kill the immortal awaiting you at the final level!

  • Number of Levels: 7
  • Estimated Duration: 30 minutes
  • A special system for those who want to shoot a lot of bullets!
    You have an infinite number of magazines, so shoot as many bullets as you like (note that you can't attack when reloading).
  • Simple but challenging levels!
    No need for tedious exploration or difficult platform actions. All you have to do is move forward and shoot the enemies.
  • Loadout system available!
    You can choose 3 equipments to bring to the levels.

You can play this game using your mouse and keyboard.

Mouse
  • Mouse Movement: Look around
  • Left Button: Shoot
  • Wheel Scroll: Switch weapon
Keyboard
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Walk
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift: Run
  • R: Reload

For more details, see "How to play" in the game.

English and Japanese are available!
The language is automatically selected according to the language setting of your system.
